DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the molecular mechanism of this disease and to research the relationship between cystinosis and skin phenotype.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical and Biological Study of Sub-pigmentation During Infantile Cystinosis
DOC.criteria: 1. cystinosis 2. known CTNS mutation 1. patient with corticotherapy treatment 2. patient with immunosuppressant treatment
